channel.title: Comments on: If you like Animal Collective, I’m pretty sure I don’t want to know you

item.title: By: S. F. Rufs
item.dc:creator: S. F. Rufs
item.description: I didn't like Animal Collective until I started experimenting with hallucinogens. Now I do like them, even while sober.
item.content:encoded: I didn’t like Animal Collective until I started experimenting with hallucinogens. Now I do like them, even while sober.

item.title: By: Chris P. Bacon
item.dc:creator: Chris P. Bacon
item.description: On another note, you fuckers are something else
item.content:encoded: On another note, you fuckers are something else

item.title: By: Emma
item.dc:creator: Emma
item.description: I like animal collective and I found this post, but I don't mind that you hate them and hope you have fun with your website. I'm sorry the internet is so cruel.
item.content:encoded: I like animal collective and I found this post, but I don’t mind that you hate them and hope you have fun with your website. I’m sorry the internet is so cruel.

item.title: By: apple sauce
item.dc:creator: apple sauce
item.description: daz cool bro. I kind of don't like how people comment on here supposedly in support of Animal Collective because it's making (as some people in other comments mentioned) all AC fans look bad... I really like Animal Collective, they're like my favorite band, but I understand that they're certainly not for everyone. Just as some people like Justin Bieber, for whatever reason and I strongly dislike his music. I don't think any of the members of the band would say anything if they read this.
item.content:encoded: daz cool bro. I kind of don’t like how people comment on here supposedly in support of Animal Collective because it’s making (as some people in other comments mentioned) all AC fans look bad… I really like Animal Collective, they’re like my favorite band, but I understand that they’re certainly not for everyone. Just as some people like Justin Bieber, for whatever reason and I strongly dislike his music. I don’t think any of the members of the band would say anything if they read this.
